title: @Riot, can Tahm Kench's next skin be a bit more serious?
body:
I love Tahm Kench's character, and admittedly his design is supposed to be both comical and intimidating, but so far his only skins are him as a chef and him dressed as Urf, which is no problem in itself. What I just hope for is that his next one tips more on the fact that he's a dangerous demon and less on him having a funny appearance. There have been a bunch of ideas that lean towards this from artists, which I'll leave below.

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/007/219/632/large/leon-ropeter-tahm-1.jpg?1504558694

Not exactly "serious" per say, but it still retains a creepier appearance.

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/006/594/792/large/fredrik-hagg-darkstartahmkench.jpg?1499798055

This one just works, given the nature of black holes as eternally hungry for everything, and Tahm's own need to feed.

https://img00.deviantart.net/b166/i/2015/301/2/9/void_world_eater__tahm_kench_sketch_by_wesnothas-d9ejhfd.jpg

Similar to Dark Star, but with a slightly more animalistic and alien feel.

One more, that's a bit more my own personal idea, is Candy King Tahm Kench. While it doesn't sound that serious based on the name or immediate appearance, like Ivern's, it's based on Tahm himself looking to eat everything, fitting into his overall theme.

replies.body:
Personally I'd love to see a skin for Kench where he's settled into one of the other regions of Runeterra - like if Tahm Kench had been around during the height of the Shuriman civilization, what could he have looked like in that culture?  I think someone wrote an entry to a fan fic compo that featured him there, and it got stuck in my head as a concept :)

(I'm not connected to the skins people; just wanted to throw in my tuppence.)

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Tq8ldQKY,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2018-01-25T22:51:59.882+0000)
>
> Personally I'd love to see a skin for Kench where he's settled into one of the other regions of Runeterra - like if Tahm Kench had been around during the height of the Shuriman civilization, what could he have looked like in that culture?

I'm picturing Jafar but fat and a catfish.

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Probably not accurate? The idea of Tahm is supposedly that he can take on any form he has to, so during Shuriman times he could very easily have been disguised as something else entirely. After all, not a lot of folk will be likely to make a deal with a ravenous catfish monster unless they're already looking to make a deal.
The Spice must flow!! Just sayin'...
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/903/458/f7b.gif?noredirect
Maybe like a croc or something since its kinda egyptian. Or a maybe just a gold and shiny catfish or sand skimmer.
What. Isn't Urf Tahm how he looked when he caused the fall of the manatee empire?

it was a great piece that hinted that tahm corrupted xerath and had him meet up with aatrox afterwards.

one of my favorite things about tahm is that he's a shapeshifter - he takes the form of his respective region. so in shurima he was some corpulent merchant boss with a fez and shit im pretty sure. in bilgewater, he's a big, Cajun catfish in a top hat. makes me wonder what he's looked like in other nations and when.

please give us tahm lore im begging you. he's such a great narrative tool and character in his own right

Holy Shit, the fic sounds amazing.
Would you mind if you share the link to it?
how about tahm in piltover?

Hextech Kench.
Yetti Kench.

I like the Wonderland skin line and I wish they'd expand from just Annie (I think?). A lot of skin lines these days are easy money-making techno, hyper colorful, seasonal, or joke skins. Tahm could have a sick Cheshire Cat inspired skin.
Queen of hearts Xayah and King of hearts Rakan. F'ck their valentine skins :( Rakan looks like a crossdressing clown.

I'm actually personally opposed to giving Xayah and Rakan duo skins ALL THE TIME. They are individual champions in their own right, they should be able to receive skins that the other does not.

On that note, Xayah is awful Queen of Hearts material. She doesn't even remotely resemble the character, nor share any of her attributes. The Queen is a boisterous, condescending, arrogant fat woman, completely oblivious to those outside of her head. Xayah is a hipster, yes, but not any of this. Someone who'd make a fantastic Queen of Hearts would be Camille. She has the haughty attitude, she's very arrogant, and always speaks down to those not in her social class. She's got booty for days plus, she fits the "OFF WITH HER HEAD" motif very well with her bladed feet. She would be magnificent for this skin.
With either Zilean or Ekko as the White Rabbit, because of the Time motif?
Definitely Zilean, because he runs hella faster than Ekko. His timebombs can be stopwatches.

We also have this one
https://art-of-lol.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/12217_league_of_legends-1030x608.jpg
Shaco has a Mad Hatter skin, but that's about it.
Unbenched Kench.

Continue the soccer skin line!

As a Tier 7 Tham Kench Main that just LOVES him, i´d INSTANTLY buy the Wonderland Tham Skin as soon as Riot made it real.

Its just to damn good and fitting.

i love tham kench rito plz
{{champion:223}}
debonair kench? might work, it's just hard to make a serious skin with a character like Tahm.
It really isn't though? This isn't Mundo or Jinx we're talking about here, Tahm is a serious character.
people keep saying he isn't serious. does anyone even read the lore? Tahm Kench will eat everything you love! If that isn't serious idk what is..
Love this post! TK needs a new skin!!!! I would love to see a battle boss skin or a Prehistoric skin. Im itching to buy him a skin but i hate the 2 available!
YES! omg yes! i love tahm Kench hes my main champ and by far my favorite champ he doesn't get enough attention in my opinion and to all my other Tahm Kench Lovers
Tahm Lickitung, please
Chefs ain’t serious eh? Gonna have to fight ye on that one. Raise thine fisticuffs!
If Tahm gets a void skin, I'll buy it and play him. But I feel like he would be directly competing with Kog'Maw regarding who eats the most.
At least eating is in Tahm's lore AND kit....
Ya Tahm needs a "bad ass" skin. That wonderland one looks awesome.

I've been in love with the idea of an Alice in Wonderland themed Kench skin since seeing that concept art, it's just too perfect. It keeps Kench's whimsicality without being as silly as his current skins are. Though I definitely love to rock Top Chef from time to time a bit of variety would be nice to have
He needs a Roomba skin tbh
I don't man to hate because I'm sure it took work to make it but that second one is ugly af

I'm personally fond of this concept:
https://pre00.deviantart.net/ea16/th/pre/f/2015/270/7/1/hellmouth_tahm_kench_by_isural-d9b2l65.jpg

Artist [here](https://isural.deviantart.com/art/Hellmouth-Tahm-Kench-562792109).

> [{quoted}](name=Epicurus,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Tq8ldQKY,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2018-01-26T03:42:52.509+0000)
>
> I'm personally fond of this concept:
> https://pre00.deviantart.net/ea16/th/pre/f/2015/270/7/1/hellmouth_tahm_kench_by_isural-d9b2l65.jpg
> 
> Artist [here](https://isural.deviantart.com/art/Hellmouth-Tahm-Kench-562792109).

That isn't Tahm Kench. That's the Imprisoned Demise from the Skyward Sword, almost verbatim. That's not going to happen because of copyright infringement.
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/zelda/images/5/5e/The_Imprisoned_Third_Battle.png/revision/latest?cb=20120218151947

Jeez, imagine how Ahri players feel, they haven't gotten a serious skin for their character since 2012 (Foxfire).

I was hoping for a Bloodmoon skin, but I guess it doesn't matter anymore.
Pretty sure that skin is a joke towards FireFox
Maybe a Tahm Kench Esq kind of skin?

Its the same problem Rumble has. All his skins are cool, but really Coconuts and Palm tree tee shirt, Pirate ship and eyepatch, Anime cartoon mecha.

Just picture a Battlecast, Mecha or Project Rumble in a more serious tone.
No kench isn't meant to be serious. He's a fat fucking fish with a mouth that could swallow a horse cock. His skins are meant to be funny.
I know you have 10 downvotes but this made me laugh so...here's one less. :D

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Tq8ldQKY,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2018-01-26T16:53:27.454+0000)

Prehistoric? Gambler/gentleman theme?
I think it would make more sense if Void Tahm Kench was the jaw monster in void fizz's splash and ultimate

That middle skin makes him look like a void toilet.

Seriously, that head-piece-thing looks like a toilet seat.
